title: "I Smell Hobbit Musk" - A Guide to Rangers
itunes:title: "I Smell Hobbit Musk" - A Guide to Rangers
description:
Oft criticised & much tinkered with, it is time to talk about troublesome tree striding Ranger. We break down the MANY options available to any budding hunters while throwing into the mix a couple of our favoured fixies that really make the Ranger slay!


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

Theme Music by Jonathan Charles

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
